message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm starting the offer at $15000.  Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $10000 for this item. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  However, this product is truly unique and offers significant value. I'm willing to come down to $12000 to make this work. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $11000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
